mapper.insert:
select rest_board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into rest_board values(#{num},#{writer},#{content},sysdate)
mapper.update: update rest_board set writer=#{writer}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, board.* from (select * from rest_board order by num desc) board) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
